sentences: On 4 December, the Secretariat reported to the SBI on the budget performance for the UNFCCC and Kyoto Protocol for the biennium 2006-2007 (FCCC/SBI/2007/19 and INF.11).
Regarding income and expenditure, the Secretariat noted the impact of the declining value of the US dollar.

On 11 December, the SBI adopted a draft COP decision on budget performance for biennium 2006-2007 and on continuing review of the functions and operations of the Secretariat, which was adopted by the COP on 14 December.
enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
